abstract: The social network has grown at a meteoric pace, doubling in size from a year ago and pushing international competitors aside.
snippet: The social network has grown at a meteoric pace, doubling in size from a year ago and pushing international competitors aside.
lead_paragraph: Facebook, the social network created in the dormitories of Harvard six years ago, said on Wednesday that it now had 500 million members.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Says Membership Has Reached 500 Million
